import React, {useState} from 'react'; const Service = () => { const [mouseHover , setMouseHover] = useState(false); const style ={ img:{ backgroundColor: 'black', // background-color in CSS color: 'white', padding: '10px', borderRadius: '5px', textAlign: 'center', textDecoration:"none", }, p:{ color:"black", fontSize:"25px", fontWeight:"700", marginTop:"25px", padding:"12px", border:"2px solid black", transition:"0.05s" }, a:{ textDecoration:"none", fontSize:"18px", fontSpacing:"0.5rem", fontWeight:"600" } } return( <>
OUR SERVICES

4 ways to be more Productive

setIsHovered(true)} onMouseLeave={() => setIsHovered(false)} > {isHovered ? "Focus on high-priority tasks first, creating a to-do list and tackling the most important items early in the day." : "Hover over this text to see more information."}

Prioritize Tasks

Focus on high-priority tasks first, creating a to-do list and tackling the most important items early in the day.

Take Strategic Breaks

Incorporate short, planned breaks between tasks to recharge your energy and maintain focus throughoutthe day.

try Time Blocking

Allocate specific time blocks for different tasks, reducing distractions and enhancing concentration on one task at a time.

establish clear goals

Establish clear and achievable goals for each day, week, or project, providing a sense of direction to stay productive.
) } export default Service;
